docstring.long_description:
Compatible with National Instruments compactDAQ devices.
Tested on a simulated NI-9229 module.

This instrument will likely only be compatible with Windows systems due to
NI driver availablity. To use the instrument you must install the runtime:

https://www.ni.com/en/support/downloads/drivers/download.ni-daq-mx.html
docstring.short_description: Configures the timing for the sample clock of a task.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The device and channel to read from.

parameters.name: sample_clock_rate
parameters.description:
Specifies the sampling rate in samples per channel per second.
If you use an external source for the Sample Clock, set this input to the maximum expected rate of that clock.
Uses the onboard clock of the device.

parameters.name: number_of_samples_per_channel
parameters.description: Specifies the number of samples to acquire or generate for each channel in the task
